snippet: Bosch, who said the clinic was a legitimate business gone awry, sought a more lenient term because of his cooperation in the investigation, but a judge refused his request.
abstract: Anthony Bosch is sentenced to four years in federal prison for his part in the Biogenesis of America doping scandal; was charged with posing as a doctor and illegally supplying steroid injections and other performance-enhancing drugs to professional baseball players and even high school athletes.
lead_paragraph: Bosch, who said the clinic was a legitimate business gone awry, sought a more lenient term because of his cooperation in the investigation, but a judge refused his request.

headline.main: Anthony Bosch Sentenced to Four Years in Biogenesis Steroid Case
headline.print_headline: Bosch Sentenced to Four Years in Biogenesis Case
